content:
{"name": "Edison Senior Center", "alternate_name": "", "description": " Anyone 60 and over is welcome. Round-trip transportation is available to all sites. Home-delivered 
meals are available for the mobility-impaired. Suggested Meal Donation: In-person: $2.25; Home 
Delivered: $2.75. More program details available at the end of this document or contact Middlesex 
County Senior Meal Program at 732-745-2062", "email": "", "url": "https://www.edisonnj.org/departments/senior_citizen_services/index.php", "status": "active", "address": {"address_1": "2963 Woodbridge Avenue", "address_2": null, "city": "Edison", "state_province": "NJ", "postal_code": "08837", "country": "US"}, "location": {"latitude": 40.5169215, "longitude": -74.35171849999999}, "phones": [{"number": "(732) 452-0377", "type": "voice"}], "regular_schedule": [{"weekday": "Monday", "opens_at": "13:00", "closes_at": "19:30"}, {"weekday": "Tuesday", "opens_at": "13:00", "closes_at": "19:30"}, {"weekday": "Wednesday", "opens_at": "13:00", "closes_at": "19:30"}, {"weekday": "Thursday", "opens_at": "13:00", "closes_at": "19:30"}, {"weekday": "Friday", "opens_at": "13:00", "closes_at": "19:30"}], "service_attributes": [{"attribute_key": "REQUIREMENT", "attribute_value": "Seniors Only"}, {"attribute_key": "OFFERING", "attribute_value": "Meal delivery available for seniors"}]}
